short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse and watch Dota 2 livestreams. Mark streams as favorites and receive alerts when they're live.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always know when your favorite Dota 2 streamers are online! Dota 2 Stream Browser displays the currently live streams in a handy drop down within Chrome. Like a particular streamer? Click on the icon next to their stream to mark it as a favorite stream and receive notifications when they're online and streaming!
